mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, /* ✅ 스터디별 닉네임 규칙 적용 */ COALESCE(rjr.request_user_nickname, r.hostUserNickname, NULLIF(u.nickname, ''), u.name) AS nickname, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted_at FROM board_comments c LEFT JOIN board_posts p ON p.post_id = c.post_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN room r ON r.room_id = p.room_id LEFT JOIN room_join_request rjr ON rjr.room_id = p.room_id AND rjr.request_user_email = u.email AND rjr.status = '승인' WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.parent_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, COALESCE(c.parent_id, c.comment_id), c.created_at ASC, c.comment_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comments (post_id, user_id, content, parent_id ) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comments SET deleted_at = NOW(), content = '삭제된 댓글입니다.', updated_at = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
